divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my patio window to the southeastern sky. The disc blended into the cloud, was hovering for about 2 minutes. I couldn't be sure it was real but then realized it was. There was a bright flash of light and it was gone. Left a trail for 1 to 2 seconds.
Summary: disc-shaped object, blended into cloud, hovered, bright flash then disappeared.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around October 16th 2009
